class.name: Phaser.RandomDataGenerator

parameters.name: seeds
parameters.help: An array of values to use as the seed.

class.help: An extremely useful repeatable random data generator.\nBased on Nonsense by Josh Faul https://github.com/jocafa/Nonsense.\nRandom number generator from http://baagoe.org/en/wiki/Better_random_numbers_for_javascript

public.name: angle
public.help: Returns a random angle between -180 and 180.

public.name: between

returns.help: A random number between min and max.

public.help: Returns a random integer between and including min and max.\nThis method is an alias for RandomDataGenerator.integerInRange.

parameters.name: min
parameters.help: The minimum value in the range.

parameters.name: max
parameters.help: The maximum value in the range.

public.name: frac

returns.help: A random real number between 0 and 1.

public.help: Returns a random real number between 0 and 1.

public.name: integer
public.help: Returns a random integer between 0 and 2^32.

public.name: integerInRange

returns.help: A random number between min and max.

public.help: Returns a random integer between and including min and max.

parameters.name: min
parameters.help: The minimum value in the range.

parameters.name: max
parameters.help: The maximum value in the range.

public.name: normal

returns.help: A random real number between -1 and 1.

public.help: Returns a random real number between -1 and 1.

returns.help: A random member of the array.

parameters.name: ary
parameters.help: An Array to pick a random member of.

public.name: real

returns.help: A random real number between 0 and 2^32.

public.help: Returns a random real number between 0 and 2^32.

public.name: realInRange

returns.help: A random number between min and max.

public.help: Returns a random real number between min and max.

parameters.name: min
parameters.help: The minimum value in the range.

parameters.name: max
parameters.help: The maximum value in the range.

public.name: sow
public.help: Reset the seed of the random data generator.

public.name: timestamp

returns.help: A random timestamp between min and max.

public.help: Returns a random timestamp between min and max, or between the beginning of 2000 and the end of 2020 if min and max aren't specified.

parameters.name: min
parameters.help: The minimum value in the range.

parameters.name: max
parameters.help: The maximum value in the range.

public.name: uuid

returns.help: A valid RFC4122 version4 ID hex string

public.help: Returns a valid RFC4122 version4 ID hex string from https://gist.github.com/1308368

public.name: weightedPick

returns.help: A random member of the array.

public.help: Returns a random member of `array`, favoring the earlier entries.

parameters.name: ary
parameters.help: An Array to pick a random member of.

private.name: hash
private.help: Internal method that creates a seed hash.
